price: Na Mitume tulio kwisha kukuhadithia kabla yake, na Mitume wengine hatukukuhadithia. Na Mwenyezi Mungu alinena na Musa kwa maneno.
arabic: وَرُسُلٗا قَدۡ قَصَصۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَرُسُلٗا لَّمۡ نَقۡصُصۡهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَۚ وَكَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكۡلِيمٗا
footnotes: Kadhaalika tumewatuma Mitume wengi ambao tumekwisha taja khabari zao kabla yake. Na Mitume wengine hatukukusimulia hadithi zao. Na njia ya kumpa Wahyi Musa ilikuwa Mwenyezi Mungu akisema naye moja kwa moja nyuma ya pazia, lakini bila ya kuwepo mwengine kati.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: warusulan qad qaṣaṣnāhum ʿalayka min qablu warusulan lam naqṣuṣ'hum ʿalayka wakallama al-lahu mūsā taklīman
